name: market for packing, clay product | packing, clay product | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/8199/documentation

This is a market activity. Each market represents the consumption mix of a product in a given geography, connecting suppliers with consumers of the same product in the same geographical area. Markets group the producers and also the imports of the product (if relevant) within the same geographical area. They also account for transport to the consumer and for the losses during that process, when relevant.;This is the market for  'packing, clay product', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is delivering the service of 'packing, clay product'. It represents a process with an annual production volume of 1,000,000 kg/year and a density of 1,600 m3/kg, while the estimated lifetime of the machines is assumed to be 25 years. The process includes building materials, packing process, loading of the bags on pallets, electricity, waste and machinery. However, the service excludes the input of clay and it should be used alongside 1 kg of it.

This activity starts with the service generation.


This activity ends with the service supplied to its consumers. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: N:Administrative and support service activities/82:Office administrative, office support and other business support activities/829:Business support service activities n.e.c./8292:Packaging activities
